import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; const SchoolUniform = () => { const uniformDetails = [ { class: "Nursery - UKG", boys: "White shirt, Navy blue shorts, White socks, Black shoes", girls: "White shirt, Navy blue skirt, White socks, Black shoes" }, { class: "Class I - V", boys: "White shirt, Navy blue shorts/trousers, Navy blue tie, White socks, Black shoes", girls: "White shirt, Navy blue skirt, Navy blue tie, White socks, Black shoes" }, { class: "Class VI - XII", boys: "White shirt, Navy blue trousers, Navy blue blazer, Navy blue tie, White socks, Black shoes", girls: "White shirt, Navy blue skirt/trousers, Navy blue blazer, Navy blue tie, White socks, Black shoes" } ]; const uniformGuidelines = [ "Uniform must be clean, pressed, and in good condition", "Shirts should be properly tucked in", "Shoes must be polished and in good condition", "Hair should be neat and properly groomed", "No jewelry except small earrings for girls", "Nails should be clean and trimmed", "School bag should be plain and simple", "Winter uniform (sweater/jacket) should be navy blue" ]; return (
